summary: A Canadian POW major is rescued by a special British military unit made up of Germans to help lead an attack on a major Nazi fuel depot in Tobruk, Libya.
cast: Rock Hudson|George Peppard|Nigel Green|Guy Stockwell|Jack Watson|Percy Herbert|Norman Rossington|Liam Redmond|Heidy Hunt|Leo Gordon|Robert Wolders|Anthony Ashdown|Curt Lowens|Rico Cattani|Peter Coe|Lawrence Montaigne|Bob Hoy|Phil Adams|Ronnie Rondell Jr.|Lee Faulkner|Barry Ford|Fritz Ford|Walter Kightly|Joseph Sargent
keywords: north africa campaign|hot weather|british soldier|reference to erwin rommel|british
title: Tobruk
